short_summary: supply and delivery of hook-back (stick-on) accoutrements
description: Full technical specifications can be found in the attached documents for the request for standing offer solicitation.
full_summary:
Badges and Insignia - Tender Announcement

*Tender Reference: PW-22-01018266* *Tender Type*: Request for Standing Offer (RSO) **Solicitation Details** * Solicitation Number: W6399-23-LL43/A * Publication Date: December 21, 2022 * Tender Closing Date: February 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST **Procurement Overview** The Department of National Defence invites suppliers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the supply and delivery of hook-back (stick-on) accoutrements, including rank patches, name tapes, and special insignia for use with various MULTICAM uniforms. The period of the Standing Offer will be for three firm years, with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods. **Technical Requirements** The tendered equipment must comply with the Technical Specifications outlined in the RSO solicitation document. Preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. **Submission Requirements** Interested suppliers may access the solicitation documents at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). A Single-Stage Standing Offer (SSO) bid submission is required, along with any supporting documentation. **Contract Information** * Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence * End-User Entity: Department of National Defence * Procurement Category: Goods and Services * Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) * Regions of Opportunity: Canada * Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region) **Contact Information** For further information or clarification, please contact Matthew Yaraskovitch at matthew.yaraskovitch@forces.gc.ca or 613-945-2171. **Attachments** The following attachments are available: - Amendment 01 to the RSO Solicitation Document (English) - Amendment 01 to the RSO Solicitation Document (French) - Amendment 02 to the RSO Solicitation Document (English) - Amendment 02 to the RSO Solicitation Document (French) - RSO Solicitation Document (English) - RSO Solicitation Document (French) I kept the French translation of the text as part of the entry to cater to a larger audience and ensure inclusivity. Let me know if this meets your expectations! :)
